Trusted by the owners of 3,000,000 domains. | SiteGround is one of the global web hosting leaders with a unique strategy for building innovative products and technologies, currently powering over 3 Million domains worldwide.

We are proud to have built one of the best teams in the industry, with more than 500 highly-skilled professionals driven by their passion for innovation through technology. For the past year alone, we have been awarded over 30 local and international awards as an outstanding employer and socially responsible company.
